description.value:
You have learned some of the tricks the fey use to bend primal magic toward illusions and trickery.

Add @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Illusory Disguise]{Illusory Disguise}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Illusory Object]{Illusory Object}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Illusory Scene]{Illusory Scene}, and @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Veil]{Veil} to your spell list as primal spells.
